scripts.dev:app: cross-env NODE_ENV=development uni build -p app --mode development
scripts.build:app: cross-env NODE_ENV=production uni build -p app --mode production
scripts.dev:mp-weixin: cross-env NODE_ENV=development uni build -p mp-weixin --mode development
scripts.build:mp-weixin: cross-env NODE_ENV=production uni build -p mp-weixin --mode production
